title: Joint Control Examples
description: Welcome to Chapter 3 of Module 1! In this chapter, we will delve into the practical aspects of controlling humanoid robot joints using ROS 2. Building upon our understanding of URDF and TF, we'll explore how to send commands to individual joints and create basic motion sequences with Python.
